Plinyq also affirms that Seleucia in Pieria is the very first coast of Syria from Cilicia: “ Latitudo (Syrioe) a Seleucia Pieriae, ad oppidum in Euphrate Zeugma, DXXV. M.P.'' ‘⁴ The latitude (of Syria) from Seleucia of Pieria to Zeugma, a town upon Euphrates, is 525 miles.”
